column5: ***NO CLEANING FEES***  * Location Is Walkable - Most Errands Can Be Accomplished On Foot * Easy Access To US-59 and Beltway 8 * Endless Food Options - Sample Cuisine Around The World Within Half Mile  * Walmart, Trader Joe, Kroger, Shop 'n Go All Within A Mile * Close To The Galleria Mall And All Other Excitement Of City Life Right At Your Fingertips * Contact Me Before Booking Instantly. I respond promptly!
column8: COZY ONE BED IN UPTOWN GALLERIA
